attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE MANNVILLE ARMS IS ONE OF THE LAST FEW TRADITIONAL OLDE STYLE PUBS LEFT IN BRADFORD - WE DONT WANT A CHARACTERLESS TRENDY WINE BAR OR A SOULLESS NIGHTCLUB - WE WANT OUR ROCK PUB SAVING....THE ONE PLACE WE CAN GO FOR A FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE AND UNIQUE STYLE...

SAVE OUR PUB....

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
